meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jennifer Bernstein Tony Hightower Julia Kozicki Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6263.

td.p: Jennifer Bernstein, a social worker from St. Louis, Missouri
Tony Hightower, an event planner from Astoria, New York
Julia Kozicki, an attorney from Noblesville, Indiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,401)

tr.td: I'M ON STRIKE
LET ME CALL YOUR ATTENTION...
TIME FOR A CHANGE
"HALF" BAKED
HEADS IN THE HEAVENS
ONE-WORD TV CLUES
(Alex: You have to name the show most associated with that word.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1980 the Solidarity labor union was formed when the Gdansk shipworkers went on strike in this country')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1980 the Solidarity labor union was formed when the Gdansk shipworkers went on strike in this country

Tony

(Tony: Crazy, isn\'t it!)
[Laughter]

Tybalt

JuliaTony
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
